00013 // OpenGL graphics info
00014     struct s_glCaps
00015     {
00016         const GLubyte * gl_version;
00017         const GLubyte * gl_vendor;
00018         const GLubyte * gl_renderer;
00019         const GLubyte * gl_extensions;
00020 
00021         const GLubyte * glu_version;
00022         const GLubyte * glu_extensions;
00023 
00024         // stack depths
00025         GLint max_modelview_stack_depth;     // Maximum modelview-matrix stack depth
00026         GLint max_projection_stack_depth;    // Maximum projection-matrix stack depth
00027         GLint max_texture_stack_depth;       // Maximum depth of texture matrix stack
00028         GLint max_name_stack_depth;          // Maximum selection-name stack depth
00029         GLint max_attrib_stack_depth;        // Maximum depth of the attribute stack
00030         GLint max_client_attrib_stack_depth; // Maximum depth of the client attribute stack
00031 
00032         // Antialiasing settings
00033         GLint   subpixel_bits;           // Number of bits of subpixel precision in x and y
00034         GLfloat point_size_range[2];     // Range (low to high) of antialiased point sizes
00035         GLfloat point_size_granularity;  // Antialiased point-size granularity
00036         GLfloat line_width_range[2];     // Range (low to high) of antialiased line widths
00037         GLfloat line_width_granularity;  // Antialiased line-width granularity
00038 
00039         // display settings
00040         GLint     max_viewport_dims[2];  // Maximum viewport dimensions
00041         GLboolean aux_buffers;           // Number of auxiliary buffers
00042         GLboolean rgba_mode;             // True if color buffers store RGBA
00043         GLboolean index_mode;            // True if color buffers store indices
00044         GLboolean doublebuffer;          // True if front and back buffers exist
00045         GLboolean stereo;                // True if left and right buffers exist
00046         GLint     red_bits;              // Number of bits per red component in color buffers
00047         GLint     green_bits;            // Number of bits per green component in color buffers
00048         GLint     blue_bits;             // Number of bits per blue component in color buffers
00049         GLint     alpha_bits;            // Number of bits per alpha component in color buffers
00050         GLint     index_bits;            // Number of bits per index in color buffers
00051         GLint     depth_bits;            // Number of depth-buffer bitplanes
00052         GLint     stencil_bits;          // Number of stencil bitplanes
00053         GLint     accum_red_bits;        // umber of bits per red component in the accumulation buffer
00054         GLint     accum_green_bits;      // umber of bits per green component in the accumulation buffer
00055         GLint     accum_blue_bits;       // umber of bits per blue component in the accumulation buffer
00056         GLint     accum_alpha_bits;      // umber of bits per blue component in the accumulation buffer
00057 
00058         // Misc
00059         GLint max_lights;                    // Maximum number of lights
00060         GLint max_clip_planes;               // Maximum number of user clipping planes
00061         GLint max_texture_size;              // See discussion in "Texture Proxy" in Chapter 9
00062 
00063         GLint max_pixel_map_table;           // Maximum size of a glPixelMap() translation table
00064         GLint max_list_nesting;              // Maximum display-list call nesting
00065         GLint max_eval_order;                // Maximum evaluator polynomial order
00066 
00067         GLboolean anisotropic_supported;
00068         GLfloat   maxAnisotropy;                     
00069         GLfloat   log2Anisotropy;                    
00070     };
